TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
#ERROR 404: Wish not found. User dies as penalty.

I wish for ice cream.

Granted. I eat it all.

I wish for food.

Granted. I eat it all! Hehehehehee!

I wish for... um... uh... (I suck at this) uhh... the next poster to have a giant unstoppable rock fall on their head. 

Edited August 11, 2016 by Mycroft

Granted, it's less dense than air so it just sits on top of the atmosphere above me.

I wish for a mission to find out if there's life under Europa.

Granted. The kraken destroys the space mission.

I wish to know who has my stapler.

6 hours ago, cubinator said:

Granted, it's less dense than air so it just sits on top of the atmosphere above me.

I wish for a mission to find out if there's life under Europa.

I said fall  

@TrainEngie, granted. The Kraken has it.

I wish for good pizza.

Granted.

I eat it.

I wish I had given Mycroft's pizza to him instead of eating it myself.

Wish granted. Now you are hungry...

Wishing for a longer weekend... not ready for the new semester on Monday.

Granted. You have an extra weekend that lasts two minutes.

I wish for no man's sky on pc.

Granted. It crashes on startup all the time.

I wish to have moar money.

Granted. $7 Billion show up on your doorstep. You didn’t know it was stolen. So the cops don’t believe you when they show up after tracking the money and throw you in jail.

I wish I could for once have a launch go as planned.
Fervently.

Granted. Linus Kerman forgets to install parachutes. Your payload never returns.

I wish for an ssto to actually orbit, then come back safely,

it does, but youre house is behind the landing strip, and gets destroyed my the engines

I wish for unlimited entertainment

Granted. It's just this on an endless loop: HHHHHHEEEEEEEEERRRRRRRRRRRRRRR...oalisyfinewaliwuy9crpL7TF(lauiYFqa

 

I wish that KSP 1.2 would come out already.

Granted, it only comes out for console.

I wish for a lll swear words to be forgotten.

Granted. But instead ****, ****, and ****, and especially ******* become swear words.

I wish I was deaf.

Granted. It happens by you dying.

I wish for more fonts on the forum.

Granted. It takes 10 billion centuries to work out the bugs.

 

I wish I had a...wait, I already have a life! I'm good! No wish!

Error 404: Wish not found. User becomes a Kerbal in Danny2462's save.

I wish I could fly my Kerbal creations without crashing in real life.

8 hours ago, Mycroft said:

Error 404: Wish not found. User becomes a Kerbal in Danny2462's save.

I wish I could fly my Kerbal creations without crashing in real life.

1st sentence: I'm Chuck Kerman. Not even Danny can kill me.

2nd sentence: Granted, you crash in KSP and real life instead of one or the other.

I wish that the next sentence is true. BTW, the previous sentence was a lie.

ERROR 404: LOGIC NOT FOUND

I wish for another week of holiday.

Granted. You have to spend it in a hungry lion's cage at a zoo.

I wish I could get a better computer.

Granted. You have an awesome new gaming PC. But you lose all your files and backups by mistake.

I wish I had some unadulterated Dr Pepper.

Granted. However, the can has been preshaken.

I wish for a new laptop.
